## Description
 Plasma is electrified gas. a plasma cutter will cut any material &#10;&#9;&#9;&#9;that conducts electricity. Aluminum, steel, stainless, brass, copper, etc.&#10;&#9;&#9;

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |

|Mass:|20.0 kg|
|Type:|Instrument|
